To jade007, I just right click on one of the books, then select 'extract here' it always works for me :)
Thank you sceneline, you always give good quality, and make it possible for expats to watch their favourite programmes :)

Just now got around to un-raring, and the file was corrupt. Did two forced rechecks with U-torrent and it says the file is 100%. Anyone else have trouble? Don't you check your uploads at all. This is the 14th rared file that has been incomplete when trying to un-rar. All from sceneline.
